effect.text: Put a Stage 2 Evolution card from your hand on the matching Basic Pokémon. You can only play this card when you would be allowed to evolve that Pokémon anyway.

requirements.description: Must have a Basic Pokemon that has been in play since beginning of turn
Must have matching Stage 2 Evolution card in hand

tips: Include in decks with strong Stage 2 Pokemon like Blastoise or Charizard
Reduce Stage 1 count if running Breeder, but keep 2-3 as backup
Use Breeder on turn 2 if you have Basic in play turn 1
Don't wait for Breeder if you have Stage 1 and Stage 2 in hand
Breeder saves you from being vulnerable at Stage 1 for a turn

rulings.ruling: You can only use Pokemon Breeder during your turn, and only if the Basic Pokemon has been in play since the beginning of your turn
You cannot use Breeder on the first turn of the game
You cannot use Breeder on a Basic Pokemon you just played this turn
Pokemon Breeder counts as evolving the Pokemon (it is treated as an evolution)
You cannot use Breeder on a Pokemon that already evolved this turn
The Stage 1 is completely skipped; you go directly from Basic to Stage 2
You must have the correct Stage 2 for the specific Basic Pokemon
Pokemon Breeder does not work with Mysterious Fossil or Clefairy Doll
All normal evolution rules apply except for the Stage 1 requirement
The Pokemon keeps all damage counters, attached Energy, and other effects when evolved with Breeder
If the Basic Pokemon is affected by an attack that prevents evolution, Breeder cannot be used
